<option value="ua">Ukraine</option>
<option value="ae">United Arab Emirates</option>
<option value="us">United States</option>
<option value="uy">Uruguay</option>
<option value="uz">Uzbekistan</option>
<option value="ve">Venezuela</option>
</select></span></div></li>
<li class="" data-formtype="select" data-def=""><div class="label">Type</div>
<div class="input">
<span class="inputCont"><select name="type"><option value="" selected="">-</option>
<option value="1">Stage</option>
<option value="2">Prologue</option>
<option value="3">Time Trial</option>

<div class="input">
<span class="inputCont"><input name="rnk" type="text" value="" autocomplete="off"></span><select name="prnk" style="width: 50px;"><option value="equal" selected="">=</option>
<option value="smallerorequal">&lt;=</option>
<option value="largerorequal">&gt;=</option>
<option value="smaller">&lt;</option>
<option value="larger">&gt;</option>
<option value="between">Between</option>
</select></div></li>
<li class="" data-formtype="checkbox" data-def=""><div class="label">Exclude TTT</div>
<div class="input">
